'''Lightning Strike Probes''' are ruin devices found in [[Inazuma]]. They can detect {{Electro}} elements such as Players and Enemies imbued with {{Electro}} or [[Electrograna]] following players, and will turn to point in their direction when in range.

The Lightning Strike Probe is marked with the direction that it should be set pointed at. Once it has be rotated to the correct orientation, the entire Lightning Strike Probe will glow. Properly orient the Lightning Strike Probe(s) to complete the puzzle and obtain rewards.

===Known Bugs===
* Lightning Strike Probes may not activate even when in the correct orientation. Players affected by this issue can restart the game to continue playing normally.
